description: Enhance the individual team page (/teams/[teamId]) to show team roster, stats, schedule, and player leaders using the new current_team_id field
goal: Transform minimal team page into comprehensive team hub with roster, stats, schedule, and depth information

Show team stat leaders (passing, rushing, receiving)
Responsive layout with tabbed or sectioned interface
constraints: Must use existing Supabase database schema
Reuse existing UI components where possible
